QuestData.Title: A Return to Grace
QuestData.Description: <With the temple restored and its defenses back online, the Wellspring should be safe from the devourers. Conservator Olem will want to know what you've done here.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Conservator Olem and give him the good news.
QuestData.RewardText: As I thought--your arrival was by the design of the First Ones. I look forward to the legacy you forge in this land of our creators.

Objectives.Objective: Step into the Center of the Wellspring
